attributes.action: Lift all Lockdown restrictions, Let our Economy recover and UK population live!
attributes.additional_details: We have a vaccine now and the Economy should be allowed to recover. Let the most vulnerable stay home and save lives and let the people who won't be effected by he virus to get our country running again for our children and children before them.
attributes.background: The Economy has been crushed by COVID-19 and we as the general public have listened to your advice and spent a whole year of our lives indoors. Peoples mental health is deteriorating and lives are now been lost due to mental health and other factors around COVID-19 rather than the virus itself.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995
